rx.internal.util

Class MpscPaddedQueue<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rx.internal.util.MpscPaddedQueue<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the element type

    public final class MpscPaddedQueue<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    A multiple-producer single consumer queue implementation with padded reference to tail to avoid cache-line thrashing. Based on Netty's MpscQueue implementation but using AtomicReferenceFieldUpdater instead of Unsafe.
    Original algorithm presented on 1024 Cores by D. Vyukov.
    Data structure modified to avoid false sharing between head and tail references as per implementation of MpscLinkedQueue on JCTools project.
